name: Remembrance, Whirling, Like Rain
simple_desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to one enemy and further deals minor Ice DMG based on the amount of "Memoria."
desc: This ability automatically selects a target, prioritizing the enemy target that Evernight last attacked. Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Evey's Max HP to one enemy. For every #3[i] "Memoria" Evernight currently has, further deals Ice DMG equal to #2[f1]% of Evey's Max HP. After use, Evernight gains #4[i] "Memoria."
